page.text:
The raptor girl looms over you, cocking her head to the side and licking her lips as she regards your prone form. Her movements are flighty and she hisses darting forwards as you move, but upon realizing the fight has truly been taken out of you she smiles. The raptor girl bounding forwards to land in a squat,
yanking off your foot coverings
and lifting both feet to her lips. That long reptilian tongue lapping over your toes teasingly and she makes an exaggerated chirring sound as if teasing, tightening her grasp on your ankles when you try to pull away.

Your feet go in and this time the chirring isn't feigned as the raptor savours your feet. She half closes her eyes with her lips wrapped around your ankles, but her eyes snap open again as you try to pull back and her hands snap forwards to grasp your legs and pull you towards her. As this happens your predator sits down comfortably and rests both hands on her now massively distended and domed out orange belly. Your form made to curl up helplessly within her gut as it gurgles softly in welcome around you, that chirr of delight from feeling so full not letting up as it comes from the raptor who ate you. You could try taking advantage of that, or maybe struggling free.

You can feel her chirring triumphantly, but you're not beaten yet. You start kicking up a fuss within her, trying to unsettle that gurgling gut and force her to disgorge your struggling form. The muscular flesh pressing around you yielding slightly as you thrust your hands, elbows and feet against her insides. The Raptor letting out a startled urp and yelp as she clutches her jostling belly as it gurgles and wobbles around with you inside.

choice.text: try to make her spit you out

page.text: The raptor starts to look more and more distressed as you shove at her insides, unsettling her until finally she can take it no more. Doubling over on all fours as she noisily disgorges you back out of her belly, you land in a heap somewhat wetter than when you went in. The raptor girl looks dizzy and disorientated and nauseous after horking you back up, she shouldn't be an immediate threat.

gameover.text: The raptor starts to look more and more distressed as you shove at her insides, but while you're hard at work so is her belly. And soon you're in no fit state to struggle out of her, the gurgles and churns and glorps of her belly starting to replace the sound of your struggles and the yelps and hisses of her distress are replaced with the resumption of that pleased chirring. You've lost your final struggle, your body getting increasingly broken down by her gurgling gut. In time you can't even twitch, being digested down entirely as her gut rounds out into a smooth massive dome full of soupified remnants. The raptor girl chirring in delight and running her hands over the mass as her belly starts to compact and shrink down again, absorbing your nourishment and letting it course through her body.

page.text: She's chirring, enjoying herself..maybe if she lost herself in the moment you could escape. You set about moving around in there, but not struggling more..rubbing, especially focusing your attention down below you. You hear her make a startled mip of delight as your rubbing begins to bear fruit, but mere pleasure won't be enough. It's time to see if your fingers are magic enough to bring her to orgasm from the inside.

The chirring moaning sounds are music to your ears, louder than the sound of her belly around you as one hand delves down past the bulge of her belly and into her naughtyness. As things are getting increasingly hot inside her you reach your triumph, the raptor letting out a delighted cry and arching her back, thrusting her hips skywards and staining her own tail with femmecum. Leaving her flushed and sour on the ground, it'll take her a bit to recover..but she's not likely to treat you kindly for escaping her belly and spoiling her afterglow.

gameover.text: You tried. You failed. But at least you gave the raptor demi a pleasing orgasm to remember you by as you succumb inside her. The raptor girl closing her eyes, resting her hands on the bulge of your diminishing form. Your shape steadily breaking down, gurgling away into soup inside her as she relaxes in afterglow. The raptor able to cherish the drawn out pleasurable sensations of her afterglow and the pleasure of digesting you as she lays there. Her belly making little gurgles and burbles quietly as it trims back down, until you're utterly digested and not a trace of you remains, not even a bit of pudge on her middle that's as slim as it was before. All that will be left to remember you by is a saucy memory and a tingle of past pleasure for the raptor girl who'd claimed you.

page.text: As you settle in comfortably you realize the truth of your desire. To let this powerful, cunning and sexy predator claim you. The raptor chirrs and prods her belly curiously as you relax in its gurgling confines, puzzled perhaps by your lack of resistance. But after the effort of overcoming you she's not going to question a nice easy time digesting you too hard. You feel it as she rubs her belly, with each gurgle and glorp of her stomach around you you succumb a little more to her innards..yield a little more to her hands, weaken a little more such that even if you wanted to put up a fight it's too late now. You can feel yourself becoming one with her, starting to ease apart layer by layer.

gameover.text: The raptor girl remained seated and stroking, both of you losing track of time. Probably she can't put a finger on when you transitioned from digesting prey to nourishing soup within her but it happens all the same as your relaxed form breaks down and sloshes about. Her gut gradually turning round and smooth instead of bulgy and contoured and it shrinks back down. Your body given to her utterly, nothing more than fuel to nourish and sustain the predatory femme lizard. It's not perhaps the end that you could of foreseen, but it's the end you chose in the end.
